title: "At a Glance" calendar feed not updating regularly on pixel 3, Android 10
content:
The calendar feature on "At a glance" does not refresh often. 
At work I am always running between meetings, and I rely on a quick look at my phone to know where to go next. However, since upgrading to Android 10, "At a glance" calendars do not often refresh -- changes that were made 3 hours ago still haven't been reflected on the homescreen.
